message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the purchase of this amazing product with you! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1,200,000. I think you'll find it's a fair price, considering the value it will bring to your life.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's definitely a good starting point, but I'm hoping to get it a bit lower. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think!

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $1,050,000. This is a great compromise, considering the value the product holds for you. Let me know what you think!
